posts.post_content:
Looking for a PSA 2 red portrait Cobb. Open to any back.

Have a SGC 1 and 3 but trying to continue my PSA 2 run of t206 Cobb. Could possible trade up or down but also looking to buy outright.

Thanks
I'm interested in the SCG 3 if Matt isn't. Please send me photos. Thanks
823dek, I sent you a PM. You can reach me at [url]ablefts@yahoo.com[/url] and send photos there also. Thanks Mike

[quote name="823dek" post=2053840]Have an SGC 30 no PSA.....3150.00[/QUOTE]

Message sent

with no scanner...I have  pics in phone, though it wasnt originally for sale I will  send pics in order after poster sees 1st

WANT CELL PHONES NUMBERS SENT TO MY PHONE  810-308-4689 and i will send pics to your phone, much easier . Thank you

I will shoot you a text later this morning. Thanks.
Matt-
Still looking....might spring for a psa 3 too

Matt,

I know there is a clean PSA 2 Red Cobb in the upcoming REA spring auction. I think it will go live in like 2 months or so.

Yes..... I consigned it but just letting you know. Good luck with your quest!

Peace, Mike
